title: No Number Nine
description: What do you do when your amazing, beloved sister dies?Hide in your room for two years.Sleep with a very, very wrong man.Leave home and start a new life, lying to everyone you meet including your kind employer, your curious friends and the man you love?Pip Mitchell’s an expert at making seriously bad decisions. But when her past, present and future collide at the Sydney Olympic Games, she’s going to have to decide whose side she’s on – or she’ll lose everyone she loves.
author: F.J. Campbell
